short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A Chrome extension to help you choose movies on Netflix based on genres and types.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Struggling to choose a movie, just start the extension and start searching, if you can't find a movie within 15 minutes, we will help choose one for you!
